scripts.build:name: npx eosio-asc src/testname.ts --target release
scripts.test:name: yarn build:name && ipyeos -m pytest -s -x test.py -k test_name
scripts.test:publickey: yarn build:publickey && ipyeos -m pytest -s -x test.py -k test_publickey
scripts.test:table: yarn build:table && ipyeos -m pytest -s -x test.py -k test_table
scripts.test:asset: yarn build:asset && ipyeos -m pytest -s -x test.py -k test_asset
scripts.test:action: yarn build:action && ipyeos -m pytest -s -x test.py -k test_action
scripts.test:mi: yarn build:mi && ipyeos -m pytest -s -x test.py -k test_mi
scripts.test:serializer: yarn build:serializer && ipyeos -m pytest -s -x test.py -k test_1serialize
scripts.test:crypto: yarn build:crypto && ipyeos -m pytest -s -x test.py -k test_crypto
scripts.test:system: yarn build:system && ipyeos -m pytest -s -x test.py -k test_system
scripts.test:print: yarn build:print && ipyeos -m pytest -s -x test.py -k test_print
scripts.test:transaction: yarn build:transaction && ipyeos -m pytest -s -x test.py -k test_tx
scripts.test:singleton: yarn build:singleton && ipyeos -m pytest -s -x test.py -k test_singleton
scripts.test:variant: yarn build:variant && ipyeos -m pytest -s -x test.py -k test_variant
scripts.test:gencode: yarn build:gencode && ipyeos -m pytest -s -x test.py -k test_gencode
scripts.test:optional: yarn build:optional && ipyeos -m pytest -s -x test.py -k test_optional
scripts.test:extension: yarn build:extension && ipyeos -m pytest -s -x test.py -k test_binaryextension
scripts.test:contract: yarn build:contract && ipyeos -m pytest -s -x test.py -k test_contract
scripts.test:apply: yarn build:apply && ipyeos -m pytest -s -x test.py -k test_apply
scripts.test:nocodegen: yarn build:nocodegen && ipyeos -m pytest -s -x test.py -k test_nocodegen
scripts.test:finalize: yarn build:finalize && ipyeos -m pytest -s -x test.py -k test_finalize
